education.description:
Thesis : "Investigation on the Structural, Morphological, Surface, and 
Electrochemical Properties of Hydrothermally Sulfurized Metal Oxides 
for it’s Application in Dye Sensitized Solar Cells"

education.institution: Ayya Nadar Janaki Ammal College, Sivakasi, Tamil Nadu, India
Kalasalingam College of Arts & Science, Krishnankoil, Tamil Nadu, India

experience.description:
•Sulfurization of metal of Metal Oxides using Hydrothermal method
 •Preparation of Counter electrodes
 •Fabrication of lab Scale Dye Sensitized Solar Cell device
 •Achieved a higher photovoltaic performance with 7.09 % efficiency

•Preparation of Bimetallic Tungstate using Hydrothermal method
 •Tested its electrocatalytic activity using electrochemical techniques
 •Designed Microwave assisted reflux & Spray pyrolysis setup
 •Collaborated with researchers in the photocatalysts materials 
•Familiar with XRD, XPS, TEM, FESEM and BET characterization techniques
 •NOVA 2.1.6 electrochemical workstation (Metrohm Autolab)

•Preparation of Thin films via RF sputtering technique at HHV Pvt. Ltd.
 •Explored the Ion implantation techniques using Gas and Metal sources
 •Performed Gamma Irradiation experiment for prepared thin films
